js练习

10 Nov 2013 on hello

js练习题

第一题

function reverseWords(str){
    var aStr = str.split(/\s+/);
    aStr.reverse();
    newStr = aStr.join(' ');
    return newStr;
}
console.log(reverseWords('hello World'));

第二题

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>random</title>
    <style>
        #num{
            width: 35px;
            height: 35px;
            font-size: 34px;
            text-align: center;
            color: red;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <input type="button" value="开始" />
    <div id="num"></div>
    <script>
        function $(selector){
            return document.querySelector(selector);
        }
        var startbtn = $('input');
        var num = $('#num');

        startbtn.onclick = function(){
            startRandom([5,6], 5000, 500);
        };

        function startRandom(arr, time, interval){
            var len = time/interval;
            var count = 0;

            var timer = setInterval(function(){
                count ++;
                var ranIndex = parseInt(Math.random() * arr.length);
                num.innerText = arr[ranIndex];
                if(count >= len){
                    clearInterval(timer);
                    alert('it is over');
                }
            }, interval);
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>
